Control Name: 15.2.1 Monitoring and review of supplier services
Control Statement: The services, reports and records provided by the third party shall be regularly monitored and reviewed, and audits shall be carried out regularly

control_attributes.description: The services, reports and records provided by the third party shall be regularly monitored and reviewed, and audits shall be carried out regularly
